term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - wetting tension (or work of immersional wetting per unit area)
term.title: wetting tension

item.text: The work done on a system when the process of immersional wetting involving unit area of phase β is carried out reversibly: w W α β δ = γ β δ- γ α β and γ β δ are the surface tensions between two bulk phases α, β and β, δ, respectively.

item.alttext: w W α β δ = γ β δ- γ α β
